channel.title: The Rusty Bumblebee's Tap List
channel.description: Reporting changes to the tap list.

item.title: 02/13/2025 07:22 PM
item.description:
New Taps:
- CPB, Lupulin Brewing Company
- Limonada Rosada (Limonada Series), Tripping Animals Brewing Co.
- Speedway Stout (Vietnamese Coffee Barrel Aged), AleSmith Brewing Company

item.title: 02/09/2025 06:32 AM
item.description:

Retired Taps:
